## Differential Expression AnalysisğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜ğŸ˜³ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
```{r}
library(DESeq2)
metaFile <- "data/GSE37704_metadata.csv"
countFile <- "data/GSE37704_featurecounts.csv"

# Import metadata and take a peak
colData = read.csv(metaFile, row.names=1)
head(colData)
# Import countdata
countData = read.csv(countFile, row.names=1)
head(countData)

# How many genes
nrow(countData)

# Note we need to remove the odd first $length col
countData <- as.matrix(countData[,-1])
head(countData)

# Check the format
all(rownames(colData) == colnames(countData))

# Filter count data where you have 0 read count across all samples.
filter <- rowSums(countData) != 0
countData = countData[filter, ]
head(countData)

# How many genes do we have left?
geneleft <- nrow(countData)
paste("We now have", geneleft, "genes remaining in our dataset")
```

```{r}
# Run DESeq!

dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = countData,
                              colData = colData,
                              design = ~condition)
dds = DESeq(dds)
res = results(dds, contrast=c("condition", "hoxa1_kd", "control_sirna"))

```
```{r}
# Vocolno plot
mycols <- rep("pink", nrow(res))
mycols[ abs(res$log2FoldChange) >2] <- "red"
selects <- (res$pvalue < 0.01) & (abs(res$log2FoldChange) >2)
mycols[selects] <- "yellow"
plot( res$log2FoldChange, -log(res$padj), col=mycols)
```

```{r}
# Output
write.csv(res)
```

```{r}
# Annotation
library("AnnotationDbi")
library("org.Hs.eg.db")

columns(org.Hs.eg.db)

res$symbol = mapIds(org.Hs.eg.db,
                    keys=row.names(res), 
                    keytype="ENSEMBL",
                    column="SYMBOL",
                    multiVals="first")

res$entrez = mapIds(org.Hs.eg.db,
                    keys=row.names(res),
                    keytype="ENSEMBL",
                    column="ENTREZID",
                    multiVals="first")

res$name =   mapIds(org.Hs.eg.db,
                    keys=row.names(res),
                    keytype="ENSEMBL",
                    column="GENENAME",
                    multiVals="first")

head(res, 10)
```

```{r}
# Save results
res = res[order(res$pvalue), ]
write.csv(res)
```

```{r}

head(foldchanges)
```
```{r}

attributes(keggres)
```

## Reactome Analysis
```{r}
sig_genes <- res[res$padj <= 0.05 & !is.na(res$padj), "symbol"]
print(paste("Total number of significant genes:", length(sig_genes)))

# Generate the input file
write.table(sig_genes, file="significant_genes.txt", row.names=FALSE, col.names=FALSE, quote=FALSE)
```
